text:
CaseWare | Toronto, Canada | Full-time | Multiple Positions | Onsite

We are looking for experienced developers to help us build our next generation of cloud solutions for accounting and audit. CaseWare is the dominant provider of mission-critical accounting and auditing software used by domestic and global accounting firms and a leading provider of auditing software to governments, tax authorities and corporations.

We're actively hiring for the following positions:

* Data Engineer [NoSQL, Presto, Spark, Redshift]: https://www.caseware.com/careers/45B342A9F5/data-engineerlea...

* Data Platform Developer [Java, Scala, Apache Spark]: https://www.caseware.com/careers/F8CFCDD05E/software-enginee...

Our stack: Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, Java, Scala, Apache Spark, TypeScript, Angular 2. If you have experience with any of these let's talk!

Mention 'HN' in your application. Other positions available at https://www.caseware.com/careers/
